Ingredients.2: 0.5 tablespoon sesame oil, or to taste

Ingredients.6: 1 (14 ounce) can bean sprouts, drained and rinsed

Ingredients.9: 3 dashes soy sauce, or to taste

Directions.1: Heat sesame oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add ginger and garlic; cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in cabbage, bean sprouts, and oyster sauce; saute until veggies start to turn translucent, about 5 minutes. Add shrimp and soy sauce, stir, and remove from heat. Set aside until filling is cool enough to handle.

Directions.2: Heat 2 inches oil in a deep skillet to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.3: While oil is heating, place an egg roll wrapper on a dry work surface. Spoon about 1 tablespoon of filling onto the center of the wrapper. Pull the bottom left corner over the filling and fold the two sides in, moistening edges with water as you go; roll tightly to seal. Repeat to make a few more egg rolls, wiping the work surface between each roll.

Directions.4: Place several egg rolls in the hot oil and fry until wrappers are golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain while you make and cook remaining egg rolls.

Directions.5: Combine duck sauce, oyster sauce, and soy sauce; stir until well combined. Serve sauce with egg rolls.
